languages.text: "Милости... прошу, спасите меня..." {n}Юноша лихорадочно хватает воздух обгоревшими губами, то впадая в полубред, то вырываясь из него. Кожа стекает по тощему телу, как расплавленный воск со свечи. Из-под спекшихся век на вас смотрят чудом уцелевшие глаза, живые, ясные и полные боли.{/n}

"Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Милости... прошу, спасите меня..." {n}Юноша лихорадочно хватает воздух обгоревшими губами, то впадая в полубред, то вырываясь из него. Кожа стекает по тощему телу, как расплавленный воск со свечи. Из-под спекшихся век на вас смотрят чудом уцелевшие глаза, живые, ясные и полные боли.{/n}

His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under the caked eyelids.{/n}

"Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}

languages.text: « Pitié... Je vous en prie, sauvez-moi... » {n}Le jeune homme peine à respirer à travers ses lèvres brûlées. S'il semble majoritairement nager en plein délire, il lui arrive d'avoir des instants de lucidité. Sa peau coule de son corps décharné comme la cire fondue le long d'une bougie, tandis que ses yeux, miraculeusement intacts et perçants malgré ses paupières encroûtées, sont fixés sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pitié... Je vous en prie, sauvez-moi... » {n}Le jeune homme peine à respirer à travers ses lèvres brûlées. S'il semble majoritairement nager en plein délire, il lui arrive d'avoir des instants de lucidité. Sa peau coule de son corps décharné comme la cire fondue le long d'une bougie, tandis que ses yeux, miraculeusement intacts et perçants malgré ses paupières encroûtées, sont fixés sur vous.{/n}

languages.text: «Piedad... por favor, sálveme...». {n}El joven intenta coger aire entre sus labios quemados, sumiéndose y saliendo del delirio. La piel gotea de su cuerpo como cera de una vela derretida. Sus ojos, intactos de alguna forma, están vivos, claros y llenos de dolor, y te miran entre párpados mugrientos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Piedad... por favor, sálveme...». {n}El joven intenta coger aire entre sus labios quemados, sumiéndose y saliendo del delirio. La piel gotea de su cuerpo como cera de una vela derretida. Sus ojos, intactos de alguna forma, están vivos, claros y llenos de dolor, y te miran entre párpados mugrientos.{/n}

languages.text: 「慈悲を…どうか、お助け…」{n}青年は焼けただれた唇でハァハァと息を吸い、錯乱状態になっている。やせ細った体からは皮膚がただれ落ち、ロウソクから溶け出したロウのようだ。なぜか目玉は無傷で、生気があり澄んでいて、痛みに満ち、固まったまぶたの下からこちらを見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲を…どうか、お助け…」{n}青年は焼けただれた唇でハァハァと息を吸い、錯乱状態になっている。やせ細った体からは皮膚がただれ落ち、ロウソクから溶け出したロウのようだ。なぜか目玉は無傷で、生気があり澄んでいて、痛みに満ち、固まったまぶたの下からこちらを見つめている。{/n}

languages.text: “救命……救救我……”{n}这个年轻人喘着粗气，嘴唇都被烧焦了，时不时会陷入神志不清的状态。他的皮肤从他残损的身体上滴落下来，仿佛熔化的蜡油一样。不知为何，他的双眼完好无损。他的眼神鲜活而清澈，充满了痛苦，从结痂的眼皮下盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “救命……救救我……”{n}这个年轻人喘着粗气，嘴唇都被烧焦了，时不时会陷入神志不清的状态。他的皮肤从他残损的身体上滴落下来，仿佛熔化的蜡油一样。不知为何，他的双眼完好无损。他的眼神鲜活而清澈，充满了痛苦，从结痂的眼皮下盯着你。{/n}

languages.text: "Gnade ... Bitte rettet mich ..." {n}Der junge Mann schnappt durch verbrannte Lippen nach Luft, zwischenzeitlich immer im Delirium. Seine Haut tropft von seinem hageren Körper wie geschmolzenes Wachs von einer Kerze. Seine Augen, aus irgendeinem Grund noch intakt, lebendig, klar und voller Schmerz, starren dich unter verkrusteten Lidern heraus an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}

Seine Augen, aus irgendeinem Grund noch intakt, lebendig, klar und voller Schmerz, starren dich unter verkrusteten Lidern heraus an.{/n}

languages.text: "Yalvarırım... Ne olur, kurtarın beni..." {n}Genç adam, yanık dudaklarının arasından nefes alabilmek için çırpınırken mütemadiyen aklını kaybediyor. Derisi, sıska bedeninden eriyen bir mum gibi sarkıp damlıyor. Bir nebze sağlam, canlı, berrak ve acı çektiğini belli eden gözleriyle yanık göz kapaklarının altından seni izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mercy... Please, save me..." {n}The young man gasps for air through burnt lips, slipping in and out of delirium. His skin is dripping from his gaunt body like melted wax from a candle. His eyes, somehow intact, alive, clear, and filled with pain, stare at you from under his caked eyelids.{/n}
